sentences.en: These snails do not occur on low-lying coral islands.
sentences.cn: 这些蜗牛不会出现在低洼的珊瑚岛上。

sentences.en: They look like low-lying, white or grey buttes, long, narrow hills with flat tops, barely a meter high.
sentences.cn: 它们看起来就像低洼的白色或灰色的孤山，又长又窄，山顶平坦，只有一米高的山。

sentences.en: Sea walls collapsed, and low-lying areas were flooded.
sentences.cn: 海堤溃决，海水淹没了低洼地区。
